sentences.en: An anticipatory story is a trap to the teller.
sentences.cn: 对于讲故事的人而言,事先想好的故事是个框框.

sentences.en: Anticipatory breach of contract plays an important role in modem civil law.
sentences.cn: 预期违约在现代民法中占有重要地位.

sentences.en: Anticipatory L / C is opposite to time L / C.
sentences.cn: 预支信用证刚好与远期信用证相反.

sentences.en: Data quality is a function of systematic usage, not anticipatory design.
sentences.cn: 数据质量是系统使用的功能, 不是可预料的设计.

sentences.en: During that time I was diagnosed with anticipatory anxiety disorder.
sentences.cn: 就在那个时候，我被诊断出患有预想性焦虑失调症。

sentences.en: During this time I was diagnosed with anticipatory anxiety disorder.
sentences.cn: 就在那个时候,我被诊断出患有预想性焦虑失调症.

sentences.en: Finally, Milton has revised and undone the anticipatory logic of the great career narrative.
sentences.cn: 最终，弥尔顿完善了这份伟大职业的,预期的解说逻辑的框架。

sentences.en: I suffer anticipatory anxiety over my own reviews.
sentences.cn: 我自己著作的书评出来以前,我总是忐忑不安.

sentences.en: Perhaps it will go further than that: your children, before they even begin to show any signs of inattentiveness or hyperactivity, will experience a kind of anticipatory stigma.
sentences.cn: 也许事情还不止于此：你的孩子在他们表露出任何注意力分散或者过度活跃的迹象之前就会受到某种预期的偏见。

sentences.en: The air - jet yarn strength of these three kinds material has attained the anticipatory aim.
sentences.cn: 上述三种原料喷气纱的单纱强度均达到了预期的目标.

sentences.en: The morning crowd at the Four Points has that same sort of anticipatory buzz.
sentences.cn: 在福朋酒店吃早餐的人群中,就有这种嗡嗡的讨论声.

sentences.en: The prediction - based guidance generation module provides anticipatory guidance using as input the state estimate.
sentences.cn: 基于导向生成模块的预测,是利用状态估算作为输入,提供所期望的导向.

sentences.en: To that end, preemptive intelligence, often acquired by unconventional means, is feedstock of sensible anticipatory action.
sentences.cn: 为此, 通常用非常规手段来获取情报, 而先发制人的情报是明智行动的基础.

words.tran_cn: 希望；预感；先发制人；预支
预期，期望；占先，抢先；提前使用
预期的；提早发生的；期待着的

trans.tran_en: An anticipatory feeling or action is one that you have or do because you are expecting something to happen soon
